title: Anxiety and Sleep Problems in Children and Adolescents
itunes:title: Anxiety and Sleep Problems in Children and Adolescents
description:
Should we target anxiety disorders and sleep-related problems simultaneously? In this episode, Dr. Phelps discusses a narrative review to provide an overview of the evidence of the associations between anxiety disorders and sleep-related problems in children and adolescents. 

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D. 
Host: Jessica Diaz, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 36
  • Treatment Implications of Sleep‑Related Problems in Pediatric Anxiety Disorders: A Narrative Review of the Literature
